title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Quarterly Survey of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Quarterly Survey of 

Construction) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (quarterly survey construction) order 2022

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“quarter” means a period of 3 months ending on 31 March, 30 June, 30 
September or 31 December in any year; 
“Regulation” means Council Regulation (EC) No. 1165/98 of 19 May 19981, as 
amended by Regulation (EC) No. 1882/2003 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 29 September 20032, Regulation (EC) No. 1158/2005 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 6 July 20053, Commission 
Regulation (EC) No. 1503/2006 of 28 September 20064, Regulation (EC) No. 
1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 
20065, Commission Regulation (EC) No. 1178/2008 of 28 November 20086, 
Commission Regulation (EC) No. 329/2009 of 22 April 20097, Regulation (EC) 
No. 596/2009 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 June 20098 
and Commission Regulation (EU) No. 461/2012 of 31 May 20129; 

“Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006” means Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20065 as amended by 
Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council 

1 OJ No. L 162, 5.6.1998, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 284, 31.10.2003, p. 1 
3 OJ No. L 191, 22.7.2005, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 281, 12.10.2006, p. 15 
5 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
6 OJ No. L 319, 29.11.2008, p. 16 
7 OJ No. L 103, 23.4.2009, p. 3 
8 OJ No. L 188, 18.7.2009, p. 14 
9 OJ No. L 142, 1.6.2012, p. 26 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [141] 3 

of 11 March 200810, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 18 January 201211 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 201912; 

“survey” means the Quarterly Survey of Construction that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining from persons or 
undertakings to which this Order applies information specified in the Schedule, 
including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation, in so far as it 
relates to Annex B thereto. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking (other than a public
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking (other than a public 
authority) that, is classified for statistical purposes under section F of NACE Rev 
2 set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006.
text_norm: 3 order applies person undertaking (other public authority) classified statistical purpose section f nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies –
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies – 

(a) 

subject to subparagraph (b), to provide, for the purposes of the 
survey, information the general nature of which is specified in the 
Schedule in relation to- 

(i) 

each quarter, and 

(ii) 

each month in a quarter referred to in clause (i), 

in the period from 1 January 2022 to 31 December 2023, and 

(b) 

to provide the information referred to in subparagraph (a) 
quarterly, and in relation to the immediately preceding quarter, in 
the period from 1 April 2022 to 31 March 2024, 

is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 4 requirement person undertaking order applies - (a) subject subparagraph (b) provide purpose survey information general nature specified schedule relation to- (i) quarter (ii) month quarter referred clause (i) period 1 january 2022 31 december 2023 (b) provide information referred subparagraph (a) quarterly relation immediately preceding quarter period 1 april 2022 31 march 2024 hereby prescribed

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 5. The Statistics (Quarterly Survey of Construction) Order 2021 (S.I. No.
text_raw:
5. The Statistics (Quarterly Survey of Construction) Order 2021 (S.I. No. 
55 of 2021) and the Statistics (Quarterly Survey of Construction) (No. 2) Order 
2021 (S.I. No. 314 of 2021) are revoked.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: Article 4

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the person or
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the person or 
undertaking concerned and specifying the month and quarter, as the case may 
be, to which the information relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

the nature of the business; 

the number of persons engaged in the undertaking or by the 
person in the period concerned; 

(c) 

the value of construction work, 
maintenance, done in the period concerned – 

including 

repairs and 

(i) 

excluding the value of such construction work by 
subcontractors (other than labour only subcontractors) for 
the person or undertaking concerned, or 

(ii) where the value of work referred to in subparagraph (i) 
cannot be excluded, the estimated percentage contribution 
of the work referred to in subparagraph (i) to the value of 
such construction work.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates person undertaking concerned specifying month quarter case may information relates (a) (b) nature business number person engaged undertaking person period concerned (c) value construction work maintenance done period concerned - including repair (i) excluding value construction work subcontractor (other labour subcontractors) person undertaking concerned (ii) value work referred subparagraph (i) cannot excluded estimated percentage contribution work referred subparagraph (i) value construction work

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: Information on the time taken by the persons or undertaking concerned
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the persons or undertaking concerned 
to complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 March, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
